summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 33rd Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to approximately 295 feet north thereof, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13970 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
